casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Michael Lee SANDERS. No. 362A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 9, 2005. Robert K. Smith, Assistant Attorney General, Michael Parker, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 7th day of September 2005 by Defendant to Amend or File an Addendum to Record on Appeal:

*531"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 9th day of September 2005."
